item.name: gc Old Collector number of collections per second
item.key: jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=Garbage collection optimized for throughput Old Collector",CollectionCount]

item.name: gc Old Collector time spent in collection
item.key: jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=Garbage collection optimized for throughput Old Collector",CollectionTime]

trigger.expression: ({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=ClassBlock Memory",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=ClassBlock Memory",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.85)) and ({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=ClassBlock Memory",Usage.used].last(0)}<({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=ClassBlock Memory",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.96))
trigger.name: ClassBlock memory usage > 85% ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: ({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Class Memory",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Class Memory",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.85)) and ({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Class Memory",Usage.used].last(0)}<({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Class Memory",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.96))
trigger.name: Class memory usage > 85% ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}
JAVA on {HOST.NAME} has just been restarted
Less then 5% ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) of heap could be reclaimed by garbage collector
trigger.description: This could indicate that an OutOfMemory error will occur soon.

trigger.expression: ({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=Garbage collection optimized for throughput Old Collector",CollectionTime].last()}>5000) and ({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=Garbage collection optimized for throughput Old Collector",CollectionTime].last()}<10001)
trigger.name: Old garbage collector time spent > 5000 msec ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=Garbage collection optimized for throughput Old Collector",CollectionTime].last()}>10000
trigger.name: Old garbage collector time spent > 10000 msec ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}
Old Space memory fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: ({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Old Space",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Old Space",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.85)) and ({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Old Space",Usage.used].last(0)}<({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Old Space",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.96))
trigger.name: Old Space memory usage > 85% ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}
Open File Descriptor Count usage > 85% ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}
Open File Descriptor Count usage > 95% ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: ({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=Garbage collection optimized for throughput Young Collector",CollectionTime].last()}>5000) and ({Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=Garbage collection optimized for throughput Young Collector",CollectionTime].last()}<10001)
trigger.name: Young garbage collector time spent > 5000 msec ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template JMX JRockit:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=Garbage collection optimized for throughput Young Collector",CollectionTime].last()}>10000
trigger.name: Young garbage collector time spent > 10000 msec ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}
{HOST.NAME} is not reachable
trigger.description: Host is not reachable for the last 5 minutes
